titles.title: I Thank You, Lord, For Your Faithfulness

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Oh I thank you Lord for your faithfulness.
And I thank you Lord for your truth.
There've been times I just did not understand.
But I thank you Lord for your Word.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
It's the Word that sets us free.
It is the Word that brings light, with darkness all around.
It's the spoken Word, that comes from up above.
And I thank you Lord for your Word.
